title: Wise as Fu*k
itunes:title: Wise as Fu*k
itunes:subtitle: Join Gary in celebrating the release of his newest book, Wise as Fu*k! Take a special look into what it means to be wise in the four areas you need it most: love, loss, fear and success.
description:
In celebration of the release of his newest book - Wise as Fu*k - Gary's giving you a special look into what it means to be wise in the four areas you need it most: love, loss, fear and success. So, if you're ready to start putting your wisdom to work for you, join the nation for this must-hear episode and get Gary's perspective on these questions from your fellow listeners:


  • When it comes to relationships, I need to work on how I see and deal with others. How do I pick the right relationship to unfuck when most of my relationships seem like they're in good standing?
  • How do I connect with people who will truly show up for me in my life, and how can I show up for others?
  • What do you tell people who can't stop fucking up their own weightloss progress?


All that and more on this episode of Unfuck Nation with Gary John Bishop!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfuck Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfuck Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
